description: Wear 2048 is a puzzle which is based on the 2048 game.User has to swipe to move the tiles. Whenever two tiles have same tile, they merge into a more tile. When 2048 tile is created, user will win. User can play this puzzle on his/her round wear watch.Features: - Swipes work for grid area - User can replay game - User can see current score and best score - User can see point table for puzzle
descriptionHTML:
Wear 2048 is a puzzle which is based on the 2048 game.

User has to swipe to move the tiles. Whenever two tiles have same tile, they merge into a more tile. When 2048 tile is created, user will win. User can play this puzzle on his/her round wear watch.

Features:
- Swipes work for grid area
- User can replay game
- User can see current score and best score
- User can see point table for puzzle
comments: 2048 This game is not good on Sony smart watch 3, very glitchy.
